subject: UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After a horrid month of anti-soccer sentiment threatened to trump the Beautiful Game, two decent fellows — Spain’s Vicente Del Bosque and Italy’s Cesare Prandelli — will lead their teams on Sunday.
snippet: After a horrid month of anti-soccer sentiment threatened to trump the Beautiful Game, two decent fellows — Spain’s Vicente Del Bosque and Italy’s Cesare Prandelli — will lead their teams on Sunday.
